info.description:
This is 24SevenOffice Payroll API documentation. Before testing on server:

  • Generate Access Token from https://payroll.24sevenoffice.com/index.php?page=register/installningar24.php&tab=7
  • Run GET request manually with Access token to receive Auth token /api/auth?token={Access token}
  • Use Auth token in future requests using "Authorization: Bearer {Auth token}"
info.title: Payroll API documentation

get.description: Use a persistent token generated in settings page to obtain a temporary authentication token which will be used in future request for authorization

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: persistent token

500.description: Internal server error. Contact support for more info.

get.description:
Get all employee information for the company. Description of fields:
  • empId (ansattnr) employee number
  • email
  • email_copy emails are also sent to this email address
  • firstname
  • lastname
  • postaddress
  • zipcode
  • city
  • countryCode
  • clearingno bank account clearing number
  • account (bankkonto) bank account number
  • bic BIC/SWIFT code identifying the bank of the employee
  • employee_date (ansettelsesdato) start date of employment. Format YYYY-MM-DD
  • telefon
  • personnr can also be d-number for foreign workers or just birth date.
  • internationalID (Internasjonal ID) to identify an employee without a personnr or d-number
    • countryCode
    • ID
    • type type of identifier. Default is "passnummer". Available values are:
      • passnummer
      • socialSecurityNumber
      • taxIdentificationNumber
      • valueAddedTaxNumber
  • salary_type type of salary. Availble values are:
    • monthly (månedslønn)
    • hourly (timelønn)
  • salary (lønn) if salary_type is monthly this value is salary per month. If salary_type is hourly this value is salary per hour.
  • salary_valid_from (gjelder fra) start date of current salary. Format YYYY-MM-DD
  • taxtable (trekktabell)
  • employment_rate (stillingsprosent)
  • employment_rate_valid_from (gjelder fra) start date of current employment rate. Format YYYY-MM-DD
  • hours_per_week (timer pr. uke) hours worked per week. Default is 37.5
  • hours_per_week_valid_from (gjelder fra) start date of current hours_per_week. Format YYYY-MM-DD
  • vacation_percent (ferieprosent)
  • vacation_percent_valid_from (gjelder fra) start date of current vacation percent. Format YYYY-MM-DD
  • vacation_days (feriedager) starting balance of vacation days per year
  • percentage_tax_main_employer (prosentsats, hovedarbeidsgiver) default is 50
  • percentage_tax_bi_employer (prosentsats, biarbeidsgiver)
  • taxexemption only relevant for swedish clients, will be nulled for others
    • percentage
    • amount

200.description: Array of all employee information for the company.

500.description: Internal server error. Contact support for more info.

  • taxtable (trekktabell)

  • employment_rate_valid_from (gjelder fra) start date of current employment rate. Format YYYY-MM-DD
  • hours_per_week (timer pr. uke) hours worked per week. Default is 37.5

parameters.name: empId

500.description: Internal server error. Contact support for more info.

get.summary: Get list of emplyments for employee
get.description:
Get a JSON-encoded list of all employments for the employee with the specified employee Id (ansattnr). Description of fields:
  • employment_id (arbeidsforhold ID) identifier of the employment.
  • primary_employment (primært) specifies the primary employment
  • startdate start date of the employment. Required for new employments. Format YYYY-MM-DD
  • enddate end date of employment. enddate_reason is required if enddate is specified. Format YYYY-MM-DD
  • enddate_reason (oppsigelse type) reason for terminating the employment. Available values are:
    • arbeidsforholdetSkulleAldriVaertRapportert
    • arbeidsgiverHarSagtOppArbeidstaker
    • arbeidstakerHarSagtOppSelv
    • byttetLoenssystemEllerRegnskapsfoerer
    • endringIOrganisasjonsstrukturEllerByttetJobbInternt
    • kontraktEngasjementEllerVikariatErUtloept
  • employment_form (ansatt type) available values are:
    • fast
    • midlertidig
  • profession_code (yrkeskode) code of the employee's profession
  • employment_rate (stillingsprosent) employement rate in this employment
  • employment_type (arbeidsforhold) available values are:
    • ordinaertArbeidsforhold
    • maritimtArbeidsforhold
    • frilanserOppdragstakerHonorarPersonerMm
    • pensjonOgAndreTyperYtelserUtenAnsettelsesforhold
  • enterprise_number (virksomhetsnummer) enterprise number of the organization which this employment is tied to
  • working_times (arbeidstidsordning) available values are:
    • ikkeSkift
    • offshore336
    • doegnkontinuerligSkiftOgTurnus355
    • helkontinuerligSkiftOgAndreOrdninger336
    • skift365
    • andreSkift

parameters.name: empId
parameters.description: Employment Id (ansattnr) of the person to get employments for.

200.description: Array of all employments for the employee.

500.description: Internal server error. Contact support for more info.

post.summary: Post a new employment, or update an existing
post.description:
Update an existing or add a new employment. If employment_id is provided and an existing employment has the specified employment_id, that employment will be updated. If employment_id is not provided or no employment exists on current employee with the specified employment_id, a new employment will be created. employment_id will be automatically generated on a new employment if it is not provided. Description of fields:
  • employment_id (arbeidsforhold ID) identifier of the employment.
  • primary_employment (primært) specifies the primary employment
  • startdate start date of the employment. Required for new employments. Format YYYY-MM-DD
  • enddate end date of employment. enddate_reason is required if enddate is specified. Format YYYY-MM-DD
  • enddate_reason (oppsigelse type) reason for terminating the employment. Available values are:
    • arbeidsforholdetSkulleAldriVaertRapportert
    • arbeidsgiverHarSagtOppArbeidstaker
    • arbeidstakerHarSagtOppSelv
    • byttetLoenssystemEllerRegnskapsfoerer
    • endringIOrganisasjonsstrukturEllerByttetJobbInternt
    • kontraktEngasjementEllerVikariatErUtloept
  • employment_form (ansatt type) available values are:
    • fast
    • midlertidig
  • profession_code (yrkeskode) code of the employee's profession
  • employment_rate (stillingsprosent) employement rate in this employment
  • employment_type (arbeidsforhold) available values are:
    • ordinaertArbeidsforhold
    • maritimtArbeidsforhold
    • frilanserOppdragstakerHonorarPersonerMm
    • pensjonOgAndreTyperYtelserUtenAnsettelsesforhold
  • enterprise_number (virksomhetsnummer) enterprise number of the organization which this employment is tied to
  • working_times (arbeidstidsordning) available values are:
    • ikkeSkift
    • offshore336
    • doegnkontinuerligSkiftOgTurnus355
    • helkontinuerligSkiftOgAndreOrdninger336
    • skift365
    • andreSkift

parameters.name: empId
parameters.description: Employment Id (ansattnr) of the person to post employments for.

200.description: Array of all employments for the employee.

500.description: Internal server error. Contact support for more info.

get.summary: Get list of payroll runs for the company
get.description:
Get a JSON-encoded list of payroll runs for the company. Description of fields:
  • payrollrunId (lønnskjøringsnummer) ID of the payroll run
  • startDate (periode fra) start date of the payroll run. Format YYYY-MM-DD
  • endDate (periode til) end date of the payroll run. Format YYYY-MM-DD
  • paymentDate (betalingsdato) payment date of the payroll run. Format YYYY-MM-DD
  • name user-defined name of the payroll run
  • created date when the payroll run was created. Format YYYY-MM-DD
  • locked boolean value telling whether the payroll run is locked or not
  • type type of payroll run. Available types are:
    • Ordinary (ordinær)
    • Until now (hittilkjøring)
    • Extra (ekstrakjøring)
    • Vacation (feriekjøring)
  • limitDate (dato variable poster) limit date for included transactions. Format YYYY-MM-DD
  • payrollGroup group that the payroll is connected to
  • payslips number of payslips on the payroll run

200.description: Array of all available payroll runs for the company.

500.description: Internal server error. Contact support for more info.

get.summary: Get list of payroll runs for the company
get.description:
Get a JSON-encoded list of payroll runs for the company. Description of fields:
  • payrollrunId (lønnskjøringsnummer) ID of the payroll run
  • startDate (periode fra) start date of the payroll run. Format YYYY-MM-DD
  • endDate (periode til) end date of the payroll run. Format YYYY-MM-DD
  • paymentDate (betalingsdato) payment date of the payroll run. Format YYYY-MM-DD
  • name user-defined name of the payroll run
  • created date when the payroll run was created. Format YYYY-MM-DD
  • locked boolean value telling whether the payroll run is locked or not
  • type type of payroll run. Available types are:
    • Ordinary (ordinær)
    • Until now (hittilkjøring)
    • Extra (ekstrakjøring)
    • Vacation (feriekjøring)
  • limitDate (dato variable poster) limit date for included transactions. Format YYYY-MM-DD
  • payrollGroup group that the payroll is connected to
  • payslips number of payslips on the payroll run

parameters.name: payrollrunId
parameters.description: Payrollrun Id of the payrollrun to get.

200.description: Returns info about the specific payrollrun

500.description: Internal server error. Contact support for more info.

get.summary: Get list of available payslips for employee
get.description:
Get a JSON-encoded list of available payslips for an employee. Description of fields:
  • text text representation of the period of the payslip
  • payrollrunId (lønnskjøringsnummer) ID of the payroll run which the payslip is connected to
  • startDate (periode fra) start date of the period of the payslip
  • endDate (periode til) end date of the period of the payslip

parameters.name: empId
parameters.description: Employment Id (ansattnr) of the person to get payslips for.

200.description: Array of all available payslips for the employee.

500.description: Internal server error. Contact support for more info.

get.description:
Get the 20 latest payslips for an employee. Payslips earlier than this need to be requested with payrollrunId specified.

The payslips returned are base64 encoded PDFs.

parameters.name: empId
parameters.description: Employment Id (ansattnr) of the person to get payslips for.

500.description: Internal server error. Contact support for more info.

get.summary: Get a payslip for an employee
get.description:
Get a payslip for an employee specified via the ID of the payroll run.

The payslip returned is a base64 encoded PDF.

parameters.name: empId
parameters.description: Employment Id (ansattnr) of the person to get info for.

parameters.name: payrollrunId
parameters.description: ID of payroll run to get the payslip for.

500.description: Internal server error. Contact support for more info.

get.summary: Get payslips for an employee as JSON
get.description:
Get the 20 latest payslips for an employee. Payslips earlier than this need to be requested with payrollrunId specified. The payslips returned are JSON-formatted. Description of fields:
  • payrollrunId ID of the payroll which the payslip is connected to
  • netPay net amount paid out
  • paymentDate
  • paylines array of payment lines
    • sumrow boolean value whether the line is a sumrow or not
    • code payrollcode of the wage type
    • text text description of the payline
    • quantity quantity of the payline
    • unitPrice unit price of the payline
    • extent extent of the payline
    • tax tax calculation of the payline. Available values are:
      • Table Tax
      • Percentage Tax
      • Empty (no tax)
    • amount total amount of the payline

parameters.name: empId
parameters.description: Employment Id (ansattnr) of the person to get payslips for.

500.description: Internal server error. Contact support for more info.

get.summary: Get a payslip for an employee as JSON
get.description:
Get a payslip for an employee specified via the ID of the payroll run. The payslip returned is JSON-formatted. Description of fields:
  • payrollrunId ID of the payroll which the payslip is connected to
  • netPay net amount paid out
  • paymentDate
  • paylines array of payment lines
    • sumrow boolean value whether the line is a sumrow or not
    • code payrollcode of the wage type
    • text text description of the payline
    • quantity quantity of the payline
    • unitPrice unit price of the payline
    • extent extent of the payline
    • tax tax calculation of the payline. Available values are:
      • Table Tax
      • Percentage Tax
      • Empty (no tax)
    • amount total amount of the payline

get.description:
Get all available dimensions in the company. Description of fields:
  • dimid id of the dimension
  • name name of the dimension

200.description: Array of all absence periods registered in the company.

500.description: Internal server error. Contact support for more info.

get.summary: Get all dimension values for the dimension with the specified dimid
get.description:
Get all dimension values for the dimension with the specified dimid. Description of fields:
  • value dimension value
  • name name of the dimension value
  • active boolean value describing if the dimension value is active or not

parameters.name: dimid
parameters.description: Numeric id of the dimension to get values for.

200.description: Array of all dimension values for the dimension with the specified dimid.

500.description: Internal server error. Contact support for more info.

post.summary: Add a new dimension value or update an existing dimension value for the dimension with the specified dimid
post.description:
Add a new dimension value or update an existing dimension value for the dimension with the specified dimid. Value is mandatory and if the value exist the dimension value will be updated. Otherwise a new dimension value is created. Post fields:
  • value dimension value. Mandatory field.
  • name name of the dimension value
  • active boolean value describing if the dimension value is active or not. Available values:
    • 1 active
    • 0 inactive

parameters.name: dimid
parameters.description: Numeric id of the dimension to get values for.

500.description: Internal server error. Contact support for more info.

get.description:
Get a specific dimension value. Description of fields:
  • value dimension value
  • name name of the dimension value
  • active boolean value describing if the dimension value is active or not

parameters.name: dimid
parameters.description: Numeric id of the dimension to get values for.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: Value of the dimension value to get.

200.description: Array with the dimension value object.

500.description: Internal server error. Contact support for more info.

get.description:
Get all registered absence data for all employees in the company. Description of fields:
  • empId (ansattnr) employee number
  • serialNo (løpenr) serial number of the absence. Required if you wish to post an update to an existing absence
  • startDate (startdato) start date of the absence. Format YYYY-MM-DD
  • endDate (sluttdato) end date of the absence. Can be empty for absence type category 'leave_of_absence'. Format YYYY-MM-DD
  • comment
  • approved (godkjent) approved-status. Available values:
    • 1 approved
    • 2 rejected
  • percent (fravær prosent) absence percentage
  • absenceType (fraværstype) type of absence. List of available absence types can be retrieved from the absencetypes-endpoint
  • description (beskrivelse) absenceType description
  • childId barnId) internal ID of the child registered on this absence. Only used together with absence type 2 (sick child)
  • numberOfDays (antall dager) number of days of absence. Only used together with absence type 4 (vacation)
  • permisjonId ID of permisjon (leave of absence). Will be automatically generated if not provided for absenceTypes with property permisjonId.
  • startdateParental (startdato foreldrepengeperioden) start date of parental leave. Only used together with absence type permisjonMedForeldrepenger. Format YYYY-MM-DD
  • externalId can be used via API to keep track of absence periods

200.description: Array of all absence periods registered in the company.

500.description: Internal server error. Contact support for more info.

post.summary: Add new absence or update existing
post.description:
empId is mandatory to include in the body. To update an existing absence you need to add the serialNo of the absence period. An absence period must have an absenceType. Post fields:
  • empId (ansattnr) employee number
  • serialNo (løpenr) serial number of the absence. Required if you wish to post an update to an existing absence
  • startDate (startdato) start date of the absence. Format YYYY-MM-DD
  • endDate (sluttdato) end date of the absence. Can be empty for permission-type absence (alphabetical absence types). Format YYYY-MM-DD
  • comment comment field
  • approved (godkjent) approved-status. Available values:
    • 1 approved
    • 2 rejected
  • percent (fravær prosent) absence percentage
  • absenceType (fraværstype) code specifying type of absence. List of available absence types and corresponding code can be retrieved from the absencetypes-endpoint
  • childId (barnId) internal ID of the child registered on this absence. Mandatory with absencetype category 'sick_child'
  • numberOfDays (antall dager) number of days of absence. Only used together with absencetype category vacation
  • permisjonId ID of permisjon (leave of absence). Will be automatically generated if not provided for absenceTypes with property permisjonId.
  • startdateParental (startdato foreldrepengeperioden) start date of parental leave. Mandatory with absencetype with leave_of_absence_type 'permisjonMedForeldrepenger'. Format YYYY-MM-DD
  • externalId can be used via API to keep track of absence periods

500.description: Internal server error. Contact support for more info.

get.summary: Get all absence for an employee
get.description:
Get all registered absence data for an employee. Description of fields:
  • empId (ansattnr) employee number
  • serialNo (løpenr) serial number of the absence. Required if you wish to post an update to an existing absence
  • startDate (startdato) start date of the absence. Format YYYY-MM-DD
  • endDate (sluttdato) end date of the absence. Can be empty for absence type category 'leave_of_absence'. Format YYYY-MM-DD
  • comment
  • approved (godkjent) approved-status. Available values:
    • 1 approved
    • 2 rejected
  • percent (fravær prosent) absence percentage
  • absenceType (fraværstype) type of absence. List of available absence types can be retrieved from the absencetypes-endpoint
  • description (beskrivelse) absenceType description
  • childId barnId) internal ID of the child registered on this absence. Only used together with absence type 2 (sick child)
  • numberOfDays (antall dager) number of days of absence. Only used together with absence type 4 (vacation)
  • permisjonId ID of permisjon (leave of absence). Will be automatically generated if not provided for absenceTypes with property permisjonId.
  • startdateParental (startdato foreldrepengeperioden) start date of parental leave. Only used together with absence type permisjonMedForeldrepenger. Format YYYY-MM-DD
  • externalId can be used via API to keep track of absence periods

parameters.name: empId
parameters.description: Numeric employee number of the person to get absence for.

200.description: Array of all absence periods of the specified employee.

500.description: Internal server error. Contact support for more info.

get.description:
Returns an array with all available absence types for this company. The code is used to identify absence type in the absence-endpoint. Description of fields:
  • description text description of absenceType
  • code
  • inntektsmelding_type (Inntektsmelding ytelse) type reported in Digital Inntektsmelding
  • permisjonId boolean value. Describes if absence periods with this absence type should be reported with permisjonId or not.
  • leave_of_absence_type (permisjonstype)
  • percentage boolean value. Describes if absence periods with this absence type can be reported with percentage or not.
  • comment_mandatory boolean value. Describes if comment is mandatory for absence periods with this absence type.
  • category absence type category. Available values are:
    • sickness
    • sick_child
    • self_report
    • vacation
    • leave_of_absence

Returns an object with the properties of the specified absence type. The code is used to identify absence type in the absence-endpoint. Description of fields:
  • description text description of absenceType
  • code
  • inntektsmelding_type (Inntektsmelding ytelse) type reported in Digital Inntektsmelding
  • permisjonId boolean value. Describes if absence periods with this absence type should be reported with permisjonId or not.
  • leave_of_absence_type (permisjonstype)
  • percentage boolean value. Describes if absence periods with this absence type can be reported with percentage or not.
  • comment_mandatory boolean value. Describes if comment is mandatory for absence periods with this absence type.
  • category absence type category. Available values are:
    • sickness
    • sick_child
    • self_report
    • vacation
    • leave_of_absence

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: Code of the absence type to get properties for.

get.description:
Returns an array of all the children connected to an employee. Description of fields:
  • empId (ansattnr) employee number of the parent of the child
  • childId internal ID of a child. Mandatory if an existing child should be updated. Can be retrieved via get-method.
  • firstname firstname of the child
  • lastname lastname of the child
  • birthdate (fødselsdato) birthdate of the child. Format YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: empId
parameters.description: Employee Id of person to get the children for

500.description: Internal server error. Contact support for more info.

post.summary: Add new or update existing child
post.description:
Updates existing child or add a new one connected to employee specified in the body. Description of fields:
  • empId (ansattnr) employee number of the parent of the child
  • childId internal ID of a child. Mandatory if an existing child should be updated. Can be retrieved via get-method.
  • firstname firstname of the child
  • lastname lastname of the child
  • birthdate (fødselsdato) birthdate of the child. Format YYYY-MM-DD

500.description: Internal server error. Contact support for more info.

get.description:
Get all transactions for a client. Result can be limited with the search filter criteria. Filter Filters can be added as query parameters by adding a question mark (?) at the end of the URL and then separate different filters with ampersands (&). Available filters can be found below in the Parameters-section. Example: payroll.24sevenoffice.com/api/transaction/v2?payrollrunId=1&empId=10&serialNo=1 Description of fields:
  • empId (ansattnr) employee number
  • serialNo internal ID of the transaction. Serial numbers are unique per employee. Can be empty if the transaction is generated by the system (for example tax calculation).
  • payrollcode (lønnsartkode) code to identify the wage type of the transaction
  • description (beskrivelse) transaction description
  • payrollrunIds (lønnskjøringsnummer) array of IDs of the payroll runs the transaction is connected to. Can be empty if transaction has not been included on a payroll run and can be multiple IDs if it is a repeating transaction.
  • datefrom start date of the transaction. Format YYYY-MM-DD
  • dateto end date of the transaction. Can be empty if it is a repeating transaction. Format YYYY-MM-DD
  • counts (antall) count used on the transaction
  • unitprice (sats) unit price used on the transaction
  • note (fritekst) custom text on the transaction
  • extent (prosent) extent of the transaction
  • department (avdeling) which department this transaction will be connected to
  • project (prosjekt) which project this transaction will be connected to
  • tax (trekk) the tax basis of the transaction. Available values are:
    • 0 - no tax
    • 1 - table tax
    • 2 - percentage tax
    • 3 - border tax (grensegjenger)
    • 4 - not tax calculated, A02 tax
  • social_security (AGA) boolean value determining if social security is calculated for the transaction
  • benefit (fordel) benefit of the transaction reported in A-melding (A02). Available values are:
    • kontantytelse
    • naturalytelse
    • utgiftsgodtgjoerelse
  • is_paid (utbetales) boolean value if the transaction is paid out
  • vacation (ferie) type of vacation calculation for the transaction. Available values are:
    • -1 - vacation withdrawal
    • 0 - not basis for vacation
    • 1 - basis for vacation
  • wage_description (lønnbeskrivelse) wage description of transaction reported in A-melding (A02)
  • repeating (fast lønnspost) boolean value if the transaction is a repeating transaction. A repeating transaction either has no end date or the difference between the start date and the end date is more than a month.

parameters.name: payrollrunId
parameters.description: (lønnskjøringsnummer) ID of a payroll run

parameters.name: empId
parameters.description: (ansattnr) employee number

parameters.name: serialNo
parameters.description: internal ID of a transaction. Serial numbers are unique per employee

parameters.name: datefrom
parameters.description: start date of the search interval. Format YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: dateto
parameters.description: end date of the search interval. Format YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: payrollcode
parameters.description: (lønnsartkode) code to filter on a specific wage type

parameters.name: tag
parameters.description: filter result based on employee tag

parameters.name: department
parameters.description: (avdeling) filter result based on employee department

parameters.name: siteId
parameters.description: (virksomhet) filter result based on employee site. Use /organization-endpoint to get siteId

parameters.name: repeating
parameters.description: (fast lønnspost) filter result based on repeating transactions

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: max number of result rows

500.description: Internal server error. Contact support for more info.

post.description:
Creates a new transaction in the company. Every transaction is then calculated and may result in additional transactions, for example basis for vacation money and tax. Total amount of the transaction is calculated with the formula: unitprice * counts * (extent / 100) Description of fields:
  • empId (ansattnr) employee number
  • payrollcode (lønnsartkode) code used to identify wage type.
  • datefrom start date of the transaction. Format YYYY-MM-DD
  • dateto end date of the transaction. Format YYYY-MM-DD
  • counts (antall) count used on the transaction
  • unitprice (sats) unit price used on the transaction
  • note (fritekst) set a custom text on the post
  • extent (prosent) extent of the transaction
  • department (avdeling) which department this transaction will be connected to
  • project (prosjekt) which project this transaction will be connected to

500.description: Internal server error. Contact support for more info.

get.description:
Get all available wage types for the company. Description of fields:
  • payrollcode (lønnsartkode) code to identify the wage type
  • description name of the wage type
  • unitprice (sats) default unit price of the wage type
  • account (konto) account number used when bookkeeping the wage type
  • counteraccount (motkonto) counter account number used when bookkeeping the wage type
  • hidden (skjul) boolean value determining if the wage type is hidden or not when reporting
  • selfservice boolean value determining if the wage type is available in selfservice
  • tax (trekk) the tax basis of the wage type. Available values are:
    • 0 - no tax
    • 1 - table tax
    • 2 - percentage tax
    • 3 - border tax (grensegjenger)
    • 4 - not tax calculated, A02 tax
  • social_security (AGA) boolean value determining if social security is calculated for the wage type
  • is_paid (utbetales) boolean value determining if the wage type is paid out
  • vacation (ferie) type of vacation calculation for the wage type. Available values are:
    • -1 - vacation withdrawal
    • 0 - not basis for vacation
    • 1 - basis for vacation
  • benefit (fordel) benefit of wage type reported in A-melding (A02). Available values are:
    • kontantytelse
    • naturalytelse
    • utgiftsgodtgjoerelse
  • wage_description (lønnbeskrivelse) wage description of wage type reported in A-melding (A02)

200.description: Success! List of wage types returned

500.description: Internal server error. Contact support for more info.

get.description:
Get the wage type with the specified payrollcode. Description of fields:
  • payrollcode (lønnsartkode) code to identify the wage type
  • description name of the wage type
  • unitprice (sats) default unit price of the wage type
  • account (konto) account number used when bookkeeping the wage type
  • counteraccount (motkonto) counter account number used when bookkeeping the wage type
  • hidden (skjul) boolean value determining if the wage type is hidden or not when reporting
  • selfservice boolean value determining if the wage type is available in selfservice
  • tax (trekk) the tax basis of the wage type. Available values are:
    • 0 - no tax
    • 1 - table tax
    • 2 - percentage tax
    • 3 - border tax (grensegjenger)
    • 4 - not tax calculated, A02 tax
  • social_security (AGA) boolean value determining if social security is calculated for the wage type
  • is_paid (utbetales) boolean value determining if the wage type is paid out
  • vacation (ferie) type of vacation calculation for the wage type. Available values are:
    • -1 - vacation withdrawal
    • 0 - not basis for vacation
    • 1 - basis for vacation
  • benefit (fordel) benefit of wage type reported in A-melding (A02). Available values are:
    • kontantytelse
    • naturalytelse
    • utgiftsgodtgjoerelse
  • wage_description (lønnbeskrivelse) wage description of wage type reported in A-melding (A02)

parameters.name: payrollcode
parameters.description: Payrollcode of the wage type to be returned

200.description: Success! List of wage types returned

500.description: Internal server error. Contact support for more info.

get.summary: Get company and company sites details
get.description:
Returns details about the company and the company sites. Description of fields:
  • name company name
  • orgno organization number
  • enterprise_number (virksomhetsnummer)
  • address company address
  • zipcode company zipcode
  • tax_zone (avgiftssone) available values are:
    • 1    (14,1 %)
    • 1a  (14,1 %)
    • 2    (10,6 %)
    • 3    (6,4 %)
    • 4    (5,1 %)
    • 4a  (7,9 %)
    • 5    (0 %)
  • bank_account company bank account number
  • tax_account (skattetrekkskonto) company tax account number
  • industry (næring) type of industry of the company. Available values are:
    • ordinarie
    • godstransport
    • lantbruk
    • sektorunntatt
  • tax_rule (skatte- og avgiftsregel) available values are:
    • standard
    • skattefriOrganisasjon
  • retirement_age (pensjonsalder) default is 67
  • sites (virksomheter / underenheter) array of sites connected to this organization. Site model:
    • id internal id of site
    • name
    • enterprise_number (virksomhetsnummer)
    • tax_zone (avgiftssone) tax zone can be empty for sites

post.description:
Update details about the company and the company sites. Add a site object without ID to create a new site. If ID is provided in the site object, the existing site corresponding to that ID will be updated. Description of fields:
  • name company name
  • orgno organization number
  • enterprise_number (virksomhetsnummer)
  • address company address
  • zipcode company zipcode
  • tax_zone (avgiftssone) available values are:
    • 1    (14,1 %)
    • 1a  (14,1 %)
    • 2    (10,6 %)
    • 3    (6,4 %)
    • 4    (5,1 %)
    • 4a  (7,9 %)
    • 5    (0 %)
  • bank_account company bank account number
  • tax_account (skattetrekkskonto) company tax account number
  • industry (næring) type of industry of the company. Available values are:
    • ordinarie
    • godstransport
    • lantbruk
    • sektorunntatt
  • tax_rule (skatte- og avgiftsregel) available values are:
    • standard
    • skattefriOrganisasjon
  • retirement_age (pensjonsalder) default is 67
  • sites (virksomheter / underenheter) array of sites connected to this organization. Site model:
    • id internal id of site
    • name
    • enterprise_number (virksomhetsnummer)
    • tax_zone (avgiftssone) tax zone can be empty for sites

500.description: Internal server error. Contact support for more info.
